QOL.Settings.EnableTracker.Name: Initiative Tracker
QOL.Settings.EnableTracker.Hint: Enables the custom initiative tracker. This feature manages Raises during Action Sequences and Dramatic Sequences.
QOL.Settings.EnableWounds.Name: Dramatic Wounds Warning
QOL.Settings.EnableWounds.Hint: Enables the Dramatic Wounds warning. This feature displays a notice in the Approach Roll dialog for heroes, villains, or monsters based on the Dramatic Wounds suffered by actors in the scene. Note: the warning is calculated using the Dramatic Wounds of all actors of type "Player" present in the world.
